lead_paragraph: Germany's Stefan Schumacher beat four breakaway rivals in a sprint finish yesterday to win his second stage at the Giro d'Italia. Italy's Ivan Basso finished in the main peloton, 2 minutes 43 seconds behind Schumacher, but retained the overall lead, 5:43 ahead of José Enrique Gutierrez of Spain, in second.
